info.title: Azure Location Based Services Resource Provider

get.description: List operations available for the Location Based Services Resource Provider

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

get.description: Get all Location Based Services Accounts in a Subscription

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

post.description: Moves Location Based Services Accounts from one ResourceGroup (or Subscription) to another

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains Location Based Services Account to move.

requestBody.description: The details of the Location Based Services Account move.

get.description: Get all Location Based Services Accounts in a Resource Group

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure Resource Group.

get.description: Get a Location Based Services Account

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure Resource Group.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Location Based Services Account.

404.description: The specified Account does not exist.

put.description: Create or update a Location Based Services Account. A Location Based Services Account holds the keys which allow access to the Location Based Services REST APIs.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure Resource Group.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Location Based Services Account.

requestBody.description: The new or updated parameters for the Location Based Services Account.

delete.description: Delete a Location Based Services Account

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure Resource Group.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Location Based Services Account.

204.description: The specified Account was not found. Nothing was deleted.

patch.description: Updates a Location Based Services Account. Only a subset of the parameters may be updated after creation, such as Sku and Tags.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure Resource Group.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Location Based Services Account.

requestBody.description: The updated parameters for the Location Based Services Account.

404.description: The specified Account was not found. Nothing was updated.

post.description: Get the keys to use with the Location Based Services APIs. A key is used to authenticate and authorize access to the Location Based Services REST APIs. Only one key is needed at a time; two are given to provide seamless key regeneration.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure Resource Group.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Location Based Services Account.

404.description: The specified Account does not exist.

post.description: Regenerate either the primary or secondary key for use with the Location Based Services APIs. The old key will stop working immediately.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure Resource Group.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Location Based Services Account.

requestBody.description: Which key to regenerate:  primary or secondary.

404.description: The specified Account does not exist.

details.description: If available, a list of additional details about the error.

message.description: If available, a human readable description of the error.

target.description: If available, the component generating the error.

message.description: If available, a human readable description of the error.

target.description: If available, the component generating the error.

Error.description: This object is returned when an error occurs in the Location Based Service API

tags.description: Gets a list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups). A maximum of 15 tags can be provided for a resource. Each tag must have a key no greater than 128 characters and value no greater than 256 characters.

LocationBasedServicesAccount.description: An Azure resource which represents access to a suite of Location Based Services REST APIs.

tags.description: Gets or sets a list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups). A maximum of 15 tags can be provided for a resource. Each tag must have a key no greater than 128 characters and value no greater than 256 characters.

LocationBasedServicesAccountCreateParame.description: Parameters used to create a new Location Based Services Account.

id.description: The full Azure resource identifier of the Location Based Services Account.

primaryKey.description: The primary key for accessing the Location Based Services REST APIs.

secondaryKey.description: The secondary key for accessing the Location Based Services REST APIs.

LocationBasedServicesAccountKeys.description: The set of keys which can be used to access the Location Based Services REST APIs. Two keys are provided for key rotation without interruption.

tags.description: Gets or sets a list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups). A maximum of 15 tags can be provided for a resource. Each tag must have a key no greater than 128 characters and value no greater than 256 characters.

LocationBasedServicesAccountUpdateParame.description: Parameters used to update an existing Location Based Services Account.

LocationBasedServicesAccounts.description: A list of Location Based Services Accounts.

resourceIds.description: A list of resource names to move from the source resource group.

targetResourceGroup.description: The name of the destination resource group.

LocationBasedServicesAccountsMoveRequest.description: The description of what resources to move between resource groups.

keyType.description: Whether the operation refers to the primary or secondary key.

LocationBasedServicesKeySpecification.description: Whether the operation refers to the primary or secondary key.

value.description: An operation available for Location Based Services.

operation.description: The action that users can perform, based on their permission level.

provider.description: Service provider: Microsoft Location Based Services.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed.

display.description: The human-readable description of the operation.

LocationBasedServicesOperations.description: The set of operations available for Location Based Services.

id.description: The fully qualified Location Based Services Account resource identifier.

name.description: The name of the Location Based Services Account, which is unique within a Resource Group.
The name of the SKU, in standard format (such as S0).

tier.description: Gets the sku tier. This is based on the SKU name.

Sku.description: The SKU of the Location Based Services Account.

AccountNameParameter.name: accountName
AccountNameParameter.description: The name of the Location Based Services Account.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the Azure Resource Group.

SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
